wikipedia_page.main: Major Wilfrid Foulston Vernon (1882 – 1 December 1975) was a Labour Party politician in the United Kingdom who served as a Member of Parliament (MP) between 1945 and 1951.

List of United Kingdom MPs: V

response: At the 1950 general election, Jenkins stood as the Conservative candidate in the Dulwich constituency in South London, but lost by 1300 votes to the sitting Labour Party MP Wilfrid Vernon.
* Major Wilfrid Vernon, aircraft designer and Labour MP from 1945-51 for Dulwich
